sect1.title: モジュールの管理
sect1.para: Use the following command to list all available modules, enabled and disabled. Use your server's hostname rather than the instance name of your &ds389; server, like the following example hostname of ldapserver1:
sect1.screen: &prompt.sudo;dsconf -D "cn=Directory Manager" ldap//:ldapserver1 plug-in list Enter password for cn=Directory Manager on ldap://ldapserver1: 7-bit check Account Policy Plugin Account Usability Plugin ACL Plugin ACL preoperation [...]
sect1.para: たとえば で言及している memberOf プラグインを有効化するには、下記のように入力して実行します:

Note that the plugin names used in commands are lowercase, so they are different from how they appear when you list them. If you make a mistake with a plugin name, you will see a helpful error message:
sect1.screen: dsconf instance plugin: error: invalid choice: 'MemberOf' (choose from 'memberof', 'automember', 'referential-integrity', 'root-dn', 'usn', 'account-policy', 'attr-uniq', 'dna', 'linked-attr', 'managed- entries', 'pass-through-auth', 'retro-changelog', 'posix-winsync', 'contentsync', 'list', 'show', 'set')
sect1.para: After enabling a plugin, it is necessary to restart the server:
To avoid having to restart the server, set the nsslapd-dynamic-plugins parameter to on:
sect1.screen: &prompt.sudo;dsconf -D "cn=Directory Manager" ldap://ldapserver1 config replace nsslapd-dynamic-plugins=on Enter password for cn=Directory Manager on ldap://ldapserver1: Successfully replaced "nsslapd-dynamic-plugins"
